titleStmt.title: An abstract of the unfortunate and unparallel case of Eliz. Wandesford weddow and relict of Garret Foulkes, Esq; and of her aged mother and children, ...

notesStmt.note: Docket title: 'The case of Elizabeth Wandesford, widow and relick of Garret Foulkes, Esq; &c.' - A petition to the Irish Parliament.
